      • create

        Datastream create(Datastream toCreate)
                  throws HttpException
        Parameters:
        toCreate - datastream to be created datapoint to be created over the API
        Returns:
        the datastream with created fields populated, on successful operation
        Throws:
        HttpException - if failed to create datastream over the API

      • create

        java.util.Collection<Datastream> create(Datastream... toCreate)
                                        throws HttpException
        Parameters:
        toCreate - one or more datastreams to be created datapoint to be created over the API
        Returns:
        a collection of datastream with created fields populated, on successful operation
        Throws:
        HttpException - if failed to create datastream over the API
        See Also:
        for creating and returning one datastream

      • get

        Datastream get(java.lang.String dataStreamId)
               throws HttpException,
                      ParseToObjectException
        Parameters:
        dataStreamId - the id of the datastream to be retrieved
        Returns:
        a datastream object parsed from the json returned from the API
        Throws:
        HttpException - if failed to get datastream over the API
        ParseToObjectException - if failed to parse the returned json to datastream

      • getHistoryWithDatapoints

        Datastream getHistoryWithDatapoints(java.lang.String dataStreamId,
                                  java.lang.String startAt,
                                  java.lang.String endAt,
                                  int samplingInterval)
                                    throws HttpException,
                                           ParseToObjectException
        Parameters:
        dataStreamId -
        startAt -
        endAt -
        samplingInterval -
        Returns:
        datastream with dataStreamId contain a collection of datapoints that has an at value between the startAt and endAt
        Throws:
        HttpException - if failed to get datastream over the API
        ParseToObjectException - if failed to parse the returned json to datastream

      • update

        Datastream update(Datastream toUpdate)
                  throws HttpException
        Parameters:
        toUpdate - datastream to be updated over the API
        Returns:
        the datastream that was passed in, on successful operation
        Throws:
        HttpException - if failed to create datastream over the API

        Parameters:
